blocks.text: Accelerating Test Automation Across Web, Mobile, and APls.

h1: Why Moolya? Why Partner With Us?
p: At Moolya Software Testing Private Limited, we lead globally in software testing and quality assurance, partnering with clients across industries to deliver top-tier solutions. Our services ranging from functional and automation to performance and security testing are designed to enhance software quality, efficiency, and productivity, ensuring client success and satisfaction.
We go beyond vendor roles, fostering deep co-ownership with customers.
We help customers address issues by focusing on cultural fixes.
Moolya empowers C-, V-, and D-level leaders with insights.
Moolya unifies Tech, Test, Product, Customer & Business insights to scale value

p: Fastrack Automation, an advanced solution from Moolya, employs intelligent techniques to expedite your automation process in the existing environment without any platform lock in half the time.
Fastrack Automation optimizes test case design, execution, and maintenance. The service dynamically adapts to changing application landscapes, ensuring sustained efficiency gains.

h1: Fastrack Automation -Platforms & Tools supported for Web, Mobile and Desktop

blocks.text: Fastrack Automation -Platforms & Tools supported for Web, Mobile and Desktop

table: Fastrack Automation utilizes intelligent techniques such as Al and ML to automate test case creation, execution, and maintenance
Traditional test automation often involves manual scripting of test cases using programming languages or automation tools
Fastrack Automation is designed to be platform-agnostic, allowing testing across a wide range of technologies and environments without lock-in
Automation scripts may be specific to certain platforms or technologies, leading to platform lock-in
Fastrack Automation automates maintenance tasks, such as updating test scripts in response to changes in the application, reducing manual effort and improving reliability -Self Healing
Maintenance of automation scripts requires continuous effort, especially when dealing with changes in the application under test
Fastrack Automation offers a scalable architecture that can handle large-scale test automation efforts with ease, enabling teams to efficiently test complex applications
Scaling automation efforts to handle large test suites or complex applications can be challenging and may require additional resources
Fastrack Automation provides a quick and easy setup process, allowing teams to start automating tests rapidly without extensive configuration
Setting up automation frameworks and environments can be time-consuming and requires technical expertise
